data.title: CRMO Centers – CRMO Awareness
data.text:
While most health care centers with a pediatric rheumatologist will take care of patients with CRMO/CNO, below is a list of some specific hospital centers and providers that do.

Many centers have multiple clinic locations. Please inquire within when scheduling your appointment.

The Hospital for Sick Children (SickKids)

555 University Avenue

Clinic #9, Main Floor Burton Wing

Toronto, Ontario

Phone: 416-813-7281

http://www.sickkids.ca/Rheumatology/index.html

Montreal Children's Hospital/McGill University Hospital Centre

1001 Boulevard Décarie

Montréal, QC

H4A 3J1

Phone: 514-412-4400 ext. 22621

http://www.thechildren.com/departments-and-staff/departments/department-of-rheumatology

McMaster Children's Hospital in Hamilton

1200 Main St. W., 2G Clinic

Hamilton, ON

L8N 3Z5

Ontario, Canada

Phone: (905) 521-2100, ext. 76186 (nurse), ext. 78517 (clinic).

http://www.mcmasterchildrenshospital.ca/body.cfm?id=83

Alberta Children's Hospital in Calgary

2888 Shaganappi Trail NW

Calgary, Alberta

T3B 6A8

Phone: 403-955-7771 or 403-955-2721

http://www.albertahealthservices.ca/info/facility.aspx?id=1010904&service=1866

Turkey

Hacettepe İhsan Doğramacı Children's Hospital - Pediatric Rheumatology

Ankara, Turkey

APPOINTMENT VIA PHONE: You can make an appointment by calling our appointment number 444 4 444.

You can book an appointment by clicking on the online appointment link on our website.

http://www.hastane.hacettepe.edu.tr/nephrology-rheumatology-unit_204_en.html

Israel

Schneider Children's Medical Center of Israel – Pediatric Rheumatology

14 Kaplan Street,

Petach Tikvah, Israel

Phone: 972-3-9253693

Appointments: 972-3-9253210

Provider(s): Liora Harel, MD and Gil Amarilyo, MD

https://www.schneider.org.il/?CategoryID=1049&ArticleID=3173

United Kingdom

Alder Hey Children's NHS Foundation Trust Hospital - Department of Paediatric Rheumatology

East Prescott Road

Liverpool, L14 5AB

UK

Please contact us via switchboard on 0151 228 4811

Provider(s): Dr. Liza McCann, Professor Michael Beresford and Professor Christian Hedrich

http://www.alderhey.nhs.uk/departments/rheumatology/

http://www.alderhey.nhs.uk/departments/rheumatology/meet-the-team/

https://www.liverpool.ac.uk/translational-medicine/staff/michael-beresford/

https://www.liverpool.ac.uk/translational-medicine/staff/christian-hedrich/

Bristol Royal Hospital for Children & Royal National Hospital for Rheumatic Diseases - Paediatric Rheumatology

Bristol Royal Hospital for Children

Paul O'Gorman Building

Upper Maudlin Street

Bristol

BS2 8BJ

Provider: Professor A. V. Ramanan FRCPCH, FRCP

Consultant Paediatric Rheumatologist

Phone: 0117 342 8460 or 0117 342 7956

http://www.uhbristol.nhs.uk/ patients-and-visitors/your- hospitals/bristol-royal- hospital-for-children/what-we- do/paediatric-rheumatology/

Germany

Dr. Normi Brueck

Paediatric Rheumatology Section

Klinik und Poliklinik für Kinder- und Jugendmedizin (Department of Paediatrics and Adolescent Medicine)

Universitätsklinikum Carl Gustav Carus (University Medical Center Carl Gustav Carus)

an der Technischen Universität Dresden (University of Technology Dresden)

Fetscherstraße 74

D-01304 Dresden

Germany

https://www.uniklinikum-dresden.de/de/das-klinikum/kliniken-polikliniken-institute/kik/forschung/padiatrische-rheumatologie
